retweeted_status.full_text:
CFO of Funeral Home Company SCI 

“And again, it's not just COVID that we're seeing, as Tom just to reemphasize this. This is -- these are excess deaths, levels of mortality that are higher than what we've expected, even when you try to back out COVID.”

殡仪馆公司的CFO SCI
